item.title: Question for the PROS!
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

case 4408:
            if (GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                if (actionTimer == 0) {
                    sendMessage("You gain some slayer");
                    actionTimer = 10;
                    setAnimation(1658);
                    addSkillXP((150 * playerLevel[18]), 16);
                    stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    teleportToX = 2935;
                    teleportToY = 4559;
                    sendMessage("you teleport and gain agility xp ");
                }
            }
            break;

Read full topic

item.title: Question for the PROS!
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

I created a portal, ID: 4408

i then made it so when you click portal you get agility xp.

case 4408: if (GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain some slayer"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(1658); addSkillXP((150 * playerLevel[18]), 16); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

I then made it so when you click portal you also teleport to a location

case 4408: // agility portal. teleportToX = 2935; teleportToY = 4559; sendMessage("you teleport and gain agility xp ;)"); break;

My goal is that when the user clicks the portal, they get agility xp and teleported.

but it turns out i cant do this because of duplicated case names.

So is there any thing else i can do? Or combine them? Please Help all help is appreciated. thanks

Read full topic
